ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of LAWRENCE L. BAND, Q.C., of Toronto, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective May 29, 2008.
